item.title: Nick Reiner will be charged with first degree murder in his parents' killing
item.description: The 32-year-old son of famed director Rob Reiner is being held without bail. Los Angeles authorities say the charges against him carry a maximum sentence of life in prison without the possibility of parole.

item.title: Her 1951 walkout helped end school segregation. Now her statue is in the U.S. Capitol
item.description: Barbara Rose Johns was 16 when she led a walkout at her high school, credited with helping end school segregation. Her statue replaces Robert E. Lee's, which was removed in 2020.

item.title: Remembering Rob Reiner, a director who spanned genres
item.description: Reiner and his wife Michele were found dead in their home on Sunday, and their son was arrested on suspicion of murder. Critic David Bianculli remembers Reiner's contributions to TV and film.

item.title: Rob Reiner said he was 'never, ever too busy' for his son
item.description: In 2015, Reiner collaborated with his son, Nick Reiner, on Being Charlie, a story about addiction, loosely based on Nick's experiences. Rob Reiner talked about the film with Fresh Air in September.

item.title: Mahmood Mamdani on how Uganda's history shaped his belonging — and his son's moment
item.description: NPR's Leila Fadel speaks with Professor Mahmood Mamdani about his new book, "Slow Poison." The book is a firsthand report on the tragic unraveling of Uganda's struggle for independence.

item.title: 'General Hospital' star Anthony Geary of Luke and Laura fame dies at 78
item.description: Anthony Geary, who rose to fame in the 1970s and '80s as half the daytime TV super couple Luke and Laura on "General Hospital," has died. He was 78.
